resources.string:
Arduino Controller is an Android Application used to remotely control an Arduino Car or to send and receive command from every generic Arduino micro-controller.

Application also uses Google Speech Recognition API to offer the possibility to input some basic commands with your voice.

Supported Bluetooth Modules are HC-05 or similar modules that can connect with the same UUID.
